title: 9.6 Master Challenge 2
question: Mr. Thomas received an email claiming that he had won a cash prize of 1000$ for his last purchase from Amazon. He immediately got excited about the win and clicked on the link given in the mail. After clicking the link, he was prompted to fill out a form asking for personal information. What do you think about the email received? How would you guide Mr. Thomas to prevent him from becoming a victim of an attack?

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
